projects.name: To Do
projects.description: This is a site where you can make a to-do-list, mark tasks as completed and/or remove them. React Context is used to handle global state.

projects.name: Project Movies
projects.description: The site uses an API-call to fetch a list of movies displayed on the first page. Each picture is a link to a page with more details about that specific movie, which is done with React Routes and useParams.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: A social media site that uses an external API, to which you can send and like Happy thoughts.

projects.name: Ice Cream Survey
projects.description: This is a site conducting a survey of the users favorite ice cream.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: This is a site that displays some of the latest albums released on Spotify.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: A site to display the weather of e few cities in Sweden with the help of an API-call. The site also displays the forecast of coming four days.

projects.name: Plants Library
projects.description: A library of plants you can plant in your garden. There is a function to filter the plants by type or when it's time to sow. You can also sort the plants alphabetically.

projects.name: Mathbot
projects.description: A chatbot that delivered endless math problems to the user.

projects.name: Pizza Project
projects.description: A site where you can order food with JavaScript.

projects.name: Business Site
projects.description: A business-site for Waffle House. The site uses HTML to create a form and then post the answers to http-bin.

projects.name: News Site
projects.description: This project is a news site, for news about vegetarian food.
